Locale.Value:
Introducing the all-new DemoCreator 7: The extraordinary upgrade that you don't want to miss.
1. Supports recording with 5 cursor effects: During the recording process, you can add Highlight Cursor Effect, Magnify Effect, and 3 Cursor Click Effects to help highlight important features or UX elements.
2. Don’t want to record your voice? No worries! DemoCreator v7 now provides an AI dubbing function, offering 34 high-quality sounds for you to choose from. It supports one-click dubbing based on your subtitles or scripts.
3. How to quickly share completed work? DemoCreator v7 has the solution. While exporting the video, it supports fast uploading to the cloud and generates sharing links, which can be quickly distributed for comments and interaction.
4. Can’t find functions such as AI Recognition, Denoise, and Auto-Caption? In DemoCreator v7, the functions you need are conveniently placed together on the toolbar.
It's worth mentioning that this time we have launched 13 new avatars with distinctive personalities and novel styles, totaling 30 avatars. Come and experience them now!
Moreover, DemoCreator v7 has added 1,000+ special effects particles and resources. It includes effects for education, business, gaming, and holiday themes such as Black Friday and Christmas to meet all your creative needs.
Please let us know if there's anything you liked or disliked about your experience with DemoCreator 7. Your feedback is crucial! We need your help to ensure everything works better for you.
